# itm

Displays In-the-Money options by expiry for a stock.

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/itm ticker
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| ticker | Stock Ticker | False | None |


---

## Examples

```
/itm AMD
```

---
